intro: Cookulo: An experimental cooking game where your mission is to complete your Recipe Book!
description:
Mix and match ingredients to cook delicious dishes in this chill and laid-back game. Unlock new ingredients as you discover recipes worthy of your recipe book. Use your recipe ideas or experiment with unique flavor combinations to unleash your creativity in the kitchen!

Burnt a dish? No problem! Cooking is all about trial and error. With over 200 cute, hand-drawn dishes to unlock, the fun never ends!
